query.stmt: <#if info_type="notice"> select bsc.id,bsc.title,view_times,spu.name create_user,bsc.create_time from bi_notice bsc left join sys_p_user spu on bsc.create_user=spu.id where 1=1 and bsc.type=1 order by create_time desc <#if title??> and bsc.title [like(title)] </#if> <#if content??> and dbms_lob.instr(bsc.content, [content], 1, 1) > 0 </#if> </#if> <#if info_type="download"> select bsc.id,bsc.title,view_times,spu.name create_user,bsc.create_time,sf.id file_id from bi_notice bsc left join sys_p_user spu on bsc.create_user=spu.id left join sys_file sf on sf.busi_type='BI_NOTICE' and sf.busi_id=to_char(bsc.id) where bsc.type=2 </#if>
